This project is maintained by evandana

JS Mobile Conf Notes

“jsMobileConf is a two-day, two-track, developer event focused on mobility and the cutting-edge JavaScript ecosystem.”

Planned Sessions

  1. Evolution of the JavaScript, Todd Anglin, Progress
  2. Responsive Design: Beyond Our Devices, Ethan Marcotte, Independent web designer
  3. JavaScript Binary Data
  4. One Project. One Language. Three Apps
  5. Human VS AI
  6. Building Rich Offline Apps
  7. Lean Native
  8. Micro Apps – Breaking the Mobile App Monolith and Delivering Omnichannel Experiences –OR– Building Progressive (Web) Apps
  9. Machine Learning on the Go with TensofFlow.js
  10. Machine Powered Refactoring
  11. Machine Learning Capabilities for Mobile Apps

Hosted on GitHub Pages using the Dinky theme
